backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the loan document backend, defining data types (LoanType, GlobalMasterTemplate, UserProfile, etc.) and CRUD functions for user profiles, global templates, custom templates, document contents, and loan processing records with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features: removing the Loan GST document type from the application, and adding a GST watermark image as a static asset used as the default watermark on the GST Letter template.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles and notable recent changes such as removal of 'Loan GST Letter' and addition of GST watermark support.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes including background, foreground, primary, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite-based frontend app, mounting the React application at the `#root` div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that sets up React Query, manages form state, handles PDF generation and download/share flow, and renders the header and FormSection; the TemplateDesigner dialog entry point has been removed from the UI.
frontend/src/components/FormSection.tsx: Loan form component rendering all input fields, EMI auto-calculation, custom field management, and document generation/share buttons; 'Loan GST Letter' has been removed from the built-in document type list.
frontend/src/components/preview/Template: A React component that renders template overlay elements (background image, watermark, seal, signature) positioned absolutely over a document preview.
frontend/src/components/PreviewDialog.ts: A React dialog component that renders a formatted document preview with rich financial text highlighting (amounts, percentages, labels) and overlays template assets like watermarks, seals, and signatures.
frontend/src/components/TemplateDesigner: A React component providing a UI for designing and managing both built-in and custom document templates, including logo/seal/signature uploads, previewing, saving, and deleting templates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom hook that creates and returns an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing login/logout state via DFINITY's AuthClient and exposing identity, login status, and helper flags.
A generic React hook that synchronizes a state value with localStorage, initializing from stored data and persisting updates automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating custom templates on the ICP backend, including get-all, get-by-id, add, and update operations with structured error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useTemplates.ts: React hook that manages both built-in and custom document templates, syncing local state with a backend via React Query and providing CRUD operations, serialization/deserialization helpers, and bulk header updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS entry point that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for a warm orange/amber color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility function that triggers a browser file download by creating a temporary object URL and anchor element, then cleans up after the click.
frontend/src/lib/loan/calculateEmi.ts: Exports a standard EMI calculation function using the compound interest formula and a helper to format numbers as Indian Rupee currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/generatePdf.ts: Generates a minimal valid PDF by rendering a document to a canvas, converting it to JPEG bytes, and assembling raw PDF syntax with a cross-reference tableâ€”no external PDF library required.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/layout.ts: Defines A4 page dimension constants at 96 DPI, including margins, header/footer heights derived from asset aspect ratios, and the resulting content area bounds.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/renderDocumentToCan: Renders a full document page onto an HTML canvas by compositing a background, Bajaj Finance header/footer images, optional watermark, and template-driven text content.
frontend/src/lib/shareUtils.ts: Utility that attempts to share a PDF blob via the Web Share API and returns false to signal a download fallback if sharing is unavailable or fails.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/fileToDa: Converts an image File object to a base64 data URL using FileReader, rejecting non-image files with an error.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/position: Provides helpers to convert a PositionPreset enum value into CSS style objects or pixel coordinates on a canvas, supporting five anchor positions with a margin.
frontend/src/lib/templates/getTemplate.t: Defines built-in document template bodies and default Template objects for four loan document types, with functions to retrieve, normalize, and persist custom templates via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/templates/renderTemplat: Renders a document template by replacing placeholders (e.g., {{name}}, {{loanAmount}}) in headline and body strings with actual form data values, including custom fields.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates loan form data, returning an array of error messages for missing or invalid fields like name, loan amount, interest rate, year, and processing charge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the App component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/form.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and types for form data, including CustomField, LoanType, FormData, and DocumentType used throughout the application.
frontend/src/types/templates.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for document templates, including settings for background, watermark, seal, signature, logo, and custom/built-in template structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors, fonts, border radius, animations) using OKLCH color variables, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and feature requests, noting two pending tasks: removing the Loan GST document type and adding a GST Ashoka Pillar watermark image to the GST Letter template.
